articles.author: Nicolas Vega
articles.title: Gamers threaten to defect to PlayStation after Xbox Live price hikes - MarketWatch
articles.description: Peeved users speculated the change was part of an effort by Microsoft to get people to sign up for its monthly Xbox Game Pass subscription service
articles.content: Microsoft said Friday it will jack up the price for its Xbox Live Gold memberships provoking threats from some gamers to jump ship to rival Playstation.A one-month membership to the Xbox Live, which … [+1770 chars]
